title: GetObjects Command
description: Query objects with filtering and pagination

offset.description: Number of objects to skip (for pagination)

limit.description: Maximum number of objects to return

layer_filter.description: Filter to objects on this layer (by name or full path)

type_filter.description: Filter to objects of this type (POINT, LINE, CURVE, BREP, etc.)

bbox_filter.description: Filter to objects within or intersecting this bounding box

include_geometry.description: Whether to include detailed geometry data (false for lightweight listing)
